data.introduce: Q信息服务是在线机票分销中不可或缺的环节，在线分销Q信息处理服务可提供实时的Q信息查询、删除、转移等操作服务，为代理人在线销售系统提供了快捷、简便、高效的途径。
data.business: Q信息处理对应于主机的信箱处理
data.functions:
本服务支持的功能如下：
1、Q信息转移（对应于主机的QC指令）
2、向指定信箱发送信息（对应于主机的QE指令）
3、Q信息综合查询（QS）
4、Q信箱详细信息显示（对应于主机的QT指令）
5、清除一个Queue信息（对应于主机的QN指令）
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_QMsgRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@StartDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息发送的起始时间","children":[]},{"name":"@EndDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息发送的截止时间","children":[]},{"name":"@StartQID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"起始QID，用于翻页查询。若不输入表示从最新的Q信息开始查询","children":[]},{"name":"@ActionCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Q信息操作类型。OPQT/OPQR/OPQE/OPQC/OPQX","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxRow","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信息条数，目前上限为200条","children":[]},{"name":"@XRSNFlag","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"是否全部删除标识，0 –不是全部删除，1 – 全部删除","children":[]},{"name":"@DisType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"用于OPQT操作时控制是否查询各类信箱的当前Q信息数量。当属性QueueType与Agent皆为空，且该属性值为B时，会返回Office下所有信箱类型，但不显示各类信箱中的当前Q信息数量。","children":[]},{"name":"Queue","type":"array","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"Q信箱","children":[{"name":"QueueInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Q信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息查询到的ID号","children":[]},{"name":"@Content","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信箱内容，若是PNR Q，输入为PNR号；MSG Q，输入为文本","children":[]},{"name":"@QType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信息类型，0 - PNR Queue，8 – MSG Queue","children":[]}]},{"name":"Agent","type":"string","quantity":"0..5","default":"","description":"目前一次只支持一个","children":[]},{"name":"@QueueType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"信箱类型","children":[]},{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"所属Office","children":[]}]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_QMsgRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"QE QC QX对应操作\n对应成功标识","children":[]},{"name":"@StartDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息发送的起始时间","children":[]},{"name":"@EndDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息发送的截止时间","children":[]},{"name":"@StartQID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"起始QID，用于翻页查询。若不输入表示从最新的Q信息开始查询","children":[]},{"name":"@ActionCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Q信息操作类型","children":[]},{"name":"@MaxRow","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信息条数，目前上限为20条","children":[]},{"name":"Queue","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Q信箱","children":[{"name":"QueueInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Q信息","children":[{"name":"Content","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信箱内容，若是PNR Q，输入为PNR号；MSG Q，输入为文本","children":[]},{"name":"@QType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信息类型，0 - PNR Queue，8 – MSG Queue","children":[]},{"name":"@QIType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Queue item类型，仅取值1或2。\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t1 – normal，2 – priority","children":[]},{"name":"@QPid","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"进行queue操作的pid，例：15806","children":[]},{"name":"@QDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"进行queue操作的日期和时间","children":[]},{"name":"@PNRDate","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"生成PNR的日期","children":[]}]},{"name":"Agent","type":"string","quantity":"0..5","default":"","description":"Office下的Agent号","children":[]},{"name":"@QueueType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信箱类型","children":[]},{"name":"@Total","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"信箱中的Q信息总数","children":[]},{"name":"@Office","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"所属Office","children":[]},{"name":"@Max","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"最大容量","children":[]},{"name":"@New","type":"int","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"当天生成Q的数量","children":[]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <ActionCode>OPQC</ActionCode>
    <Queue QueueType="RP" Office="BJS177">
        <QueueInfo>
            <!--一次只允许转移一条 -->
            <ID>6679508924</ID>
        </QueueInfo>
    </Queue>
    <Queue QueueType="RP" Office="BJS191" />
</OTA_QMsgRQ>

<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <ActionCode>OPQE</ActionCode>
    <Queue QueueType="RP" Office="BJS177" />
    <Queue QueueType="RP" Office="BJS177">
        <QueueInfo QType="8">
            <Content>Test OPQE</Content>
        </QueueInfo>
    </Queue>
</OTA_QMsgRQ>

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: QT-查询指定信箱消息数量Rq.xml
QX-删除Q信息xflag为0-部分Qid删除失败Rq.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <!--操作类型，OPQT,OPQR ,OPQX-->
    <ActionCode>OPQX</ActionCode>
    <!--是否删除整个RSN标记，0 – 否，1 – 是（此时不需要输入QueueInfo节点，需要添加Agent节点），默认：0（此时不需要Agent，只需要QueueInfo节点）-->
    <XRSNFlag>0</XRSNFlag>
    <!--信箱类型 SC office号 BJS191-->
    <Queue Office="BJS177" QueueType="SC">
        <!--XRSNFlag=0，删除具体的Q信息可以多个  开始-->
        <QueueInfo>
            <ID>6679507254</ID>
        </QueueInfo>
        <QueueInfo>
            <ID>6679508929</ID>
        </QueueInfo>
    </Queue>
</OTA_QMsgRQ>

<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <!--操作类型，OPQT,OPQR ,OPQX-->
    <ActionCode>OPQX</ActionCode>
    <!--是否删除整个RSN标记，0 – 否，1 – 是（此时不需要输入QueueInfo节点，需要添加Agent节点），默认：0（此时不需要Agent，只需要QueueInfo节点）-->
    <XRSNFlag>0</XRSNFlag>
    <!--信箱类型 SC office号 BJS191-->
    <Queue Office="BJS177" QueueType="RP">
        <!--XRSNFlag=0，删除具体的Q信息可以多个  开始-->
        <QueueInfo>
            <ID>6679509025</ID>
        </QueueInfo>
    </Queue>
</OTA_QMsgRQ>

<!--XRSNFlag=1-->
<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <!--操作类型，OPQT,OPQR ,OPQX-->
    <ActionCode>OPQX</ActionCode>
    <!--是否删除整个RSN标记，0 – 否，1 – 是（此时不需要输入QueueInfo节点，需要添加Agent节点），默认：0（此时不需要Agent，只需要QueueInfo节点）-->
    <XRSNFlag>1</XRSNFlag>
    <!--信箱类型 SC office号 BJS191-->
    <Queue Office="BJS177" QueueType="SC">
        <!--XRSNFlag=1，删除某个Agent号下的Q信息  开始-->
        <Agent>36076</Agent>
    </Queue>
</OTA_QMsgRQ>

<OTA_QMsgRQ>
    <!--操作类型，OPQT,OPQR ,OPQX-->
    <ActionCode>OPQX</ActionCode>
    <!--是否删除整个RSN标记，0 – 否，1 – 是（此时不需要输入QueueInfo节点，需要添加Agent节点），默认：0（此时不需要Agent，只需要QueueInfo节点）-->
    <XRSNFlag>1</XRSNFlag>
    <!--信箱类型 SC office号 BJS191-->
    <Queue Office="BJS177" QueueType="SC">
        <!--XRSNFlag=1，删除某个Agent号下的Q信息  开始-->
        <Agent>36076</Agent>
    </Queue>
</OTA_QMsgRQ>
